text:
Thirty-five sand lorries were seized by the special police and revenue teams at various check posts on Tuesday.

The teams intercepted 16 lorries at Udhanapalli, nine lorries at Rayakottai and three lorries in Kelamangalam. Similarly, the revenue team led by Denkanikottai Tahsildar intercepted seven lorries in Denkanikottai. The sand was being smuggled to Bengaluru.
title: Sand lorries seized
